name: RealtyPHP-WP
author: Elod Horvath

sections.description: RealtyPHP-WP is a free real estate listing plugin for WordPress. Available languages: English(US, GB) and Hungarian. Easy to install and maintain. No special skills are required to manage listings. The administrator and the registered user can manage listings, add and delete photos for listing. The administrator can manage the countries, and the property types. Author: Elod Horvath(http://www.tunedthemes.com)
sections.installation:
Requirements: WordPress 3.3 or above,
PHP Version 5.2.17 or above,
Mysql database with innoDB support

  1. Upload the downloaded, and unzipped realtyphp folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Is RealtyPHP for WordPress a free plugin?

Yes it is.
